parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds weapon item, including magazine, directly to the [[handgunWeapon]]. This is used for infantry weapons.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''addHandgunItem''' item

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> item: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> [[player]] [[addHandgunItem]] "muzzle_snds_L";
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addWeaponItem]], [[removeHandgunItem]], [[removeAllHandgunItems]], [[addPrimaryWeaponItem]], [[addSecondaryWeaponItem]], [[addBinocularItem]], [[weaponsItems]], [[handgunItems]], [[primaryWeaponItems]], [[secondaryWeaponItems]], [[binocularItems]]
</value></part></template></root>
